attributes.action: create a boot camp system for young offenders to provide them with Life Skills / Work experience / Discipline
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I propose that the government should invest in a youth boot camp system for 12 to 17 year olds. The programs should instill Life Skills, Work experience, Discipline but most importantly ambition into the youth of today. This system should replace the excessive use of ASBO’s or youth prisons, and work in a similar way to the current community service system already in place for adults.
 
(Discipline, Respect, Motivation and Understanding)
